# usesLineFragmentOrigin

**Type Property**

Uses the line fragment origin instead of the baseline origin.

## Declaration

```swift
static var usesLineFragmentOrigin: NSStringDrawingOptions { get }
```

## Constants

- **usesFontLeading**: Uses the font leading for calculating line heights.
- **usesDeviceMetrics**: Uses image glyph bounds instead of typographic bounds.
- **truncatesLastVisibleLine**: Truncates and adds the ellipsis character to the last visible line if the text doesn’t fit into the specified bounds.
